articles.title: Stock futures are all rise after major averages rally for seven consecutive weeks: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average recorded a new intraday record on Friday, and the Nasdaq 100 had a new closing high.
articles.content: U.S. stock futures climbed on Monday morning after the three major averages notched their seventh straight week of gains. The Dow Jones Industrial Average recorded a new intraday record, and the Nasd… [+1488 chars]

articles.title: Ft. Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport back to normal operations - WPBF West Palm Beach
articles.description: Terminal 1 was evacuated at the Ft. Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport.
articles.content:
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. — The Ft. Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport has resumed back to normal operations after receiving a bomb threat.
